mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.year AS "year", a.quarter AS "quarter", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.payment_id AS "paymentId", a.sv AS "sv", a.cog AS "cog", a.cc AS "cc", a.lc AS "lc", a.billing_date AS "billingDate", a.pay_date AS "payDate", a.pccday AS "pccday", a.payment AS "payment", a.rate AS "rate", a.k_saler_id AS "kSalerId", a.k_id AS "kId", a.k_name AS "kName", a.k_sv AS "kSv", a.k_cog AS "kCog", a.k_cc AS "kCc", a.k_lc AS "kLc", a.k_gpi AS "kGpi", a.k_tr AS "kTr", a.k_ac AS "kAc", a.k_ec AS "kEc", a.k_pcc AS "kPcc", a.k_cos AS "kCos", a.k_scc AS "kScc", a.gp AS "gp", a.k_gp AS "kGp", a.k_np AS "kNp", a.k_tr_v AS "kTrV", a.k_pcc_v AS "kPccV", a.k_jz_v AS "kJzV", a.k_yj_v AS "kYjV", a.k_ew_v AS "kEwV", a.k_sc AS "kSc", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_commission a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM oa_commission a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_commission( id, year, quarter, contract_id, payment_id, sv, cog, cc, lc, billing_date, pay_date, pccday, payment, rate, k_saler_id, k_id, k_name, k_sv, k_cog, k_cc, k_lc, k_gpi, k_tr, k_ac, k_ec, k_pcc, k_cos, k_scc, gp, k_gp, k_np, k_tr_v, k_pcc_v, k_jz_v, k_yj_v, k_ew_v, k_sc, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{year}, #{quarter}, #{contractId}, #{paymentId}, #{sv}, #{cog}, #{cc}, #{lc}, #{billingDate}, #{payDate}, #{pccday}, #{payment}, #{rate}, #{kSalerId}, #{kId}, #{kName}, #{kSv}, #{kCog}, #{kCc}, #{kLc}, #{kGpi}, #{kTr}, #{kAc}, #{kEc}, #{kPcc}, #{kCos}, #{kScc}, #{gp}, #{kGp}, #{kNp}, #{kTrV}, #{kPccV}, #{kJzV}, #{kYjV}, #{kEwV}, #{kSc}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_commission SET year = #{year}, quarter = #{quarter}, contract_id = #{contractId}, payment_id = #{paymentId}, sv = #{sv}, cog = #{cog}, cc = #{cc}, lc = #{lc}, billing_date = #{billingDate}, pay_date = #{payDate}, pccday = #{pccday}, payment = #{payment}, rate = #{rate}, k_saler_id = #{kSalerId}, k_id = #{kId}, k_name = #{kName}, k_sv = #{kSv}, k_cog = #{kCog}, k_cc = #{kCc}, k_lc = #{kLc}, k_gpi = #{kGpi}, k_tr = #{kTr}, k_ac = #{kAc}, k_ec = #{kEc}, k_pcc = #{kPcc}, k_cos = #{kCos}, k_scc = #{kScc}, gp = #{gp}, k_gp = #{kGp}, k_np = #{kNp}, k_tr_v = #{kTrV}, k_pcc_v = #{kPccV}, k_jz_v = #{kJzV}, k_yj_v = #{kYjV}, k_ew_v = #{kEwV}, k_sc = #{kSc}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
